price: Sabõda haka ba sai Na yi rantsuwa da Ubangijin wurãren ɓullõwar rãna da wurãren fãɗuwarta ba, lalle Mũ, Mãsu iyãwa ne.
arabic: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلۡمَشَٰرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغَٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَٰدِرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falā uq'simu birabbi al-mashāriqi wal-maghāribi innā laqādirūna
